html: Received Honorary Certificate of Appreciation from IEEE Communications Society Student Competition 2025 for "Democratizing 6G: AI-Native Wireless Digital Twin for Global Digital Equity and Sustainability."
2 papers accepted at @ICASSP 2026 — Continual Learning-Based Loss Regularization for Channel Prediction and Conditional Prior-Based Diffusion Models for Channel Estimation.
1 Paper accepted at @NeurIPS 2025 — ITDPDM: Information-Theoretic Discrete Poisson Diffusion Model.
1 paper for Continual Learning for Wireless Channel Prediction accepted at @ICML 2025 Workshop taking place in Vancouver.
1 paper for RAG Optimized Wireless Environment Perception accepted and awarded Best Workshop Paper @ICC 2025 Workshop taking place in Montreal.
Delivered a presentation titled "AI in Healthcare" at Norman Regional Hospital under the supervision of Dr. Lubna Mirza.
Recipient of the College of Engineering Graduate Fellowship 2025.
2 papers for Hierarchical Deep RL and Joint Source Compression accepted at @AAAI 2025 Workshop taking place in Philadelphia.
Runner-up Award for Best Student Presentation at the IEEE DSAA'24 Student Forum.
Awarded the Student Travel Grant for IEEE DSAA 2024.
Final Year Project received the 1st Best Adjudged Industrial Project Award at the NUST Open House 2024.
PhD Acceptance from University of Oklahoma with Graduate Fellowship.
Winner of the Prime Minister Laptop Scheme.
Selected as an Undergraduate Research Intern for the First Cohort of UGRIP by MBZUAI.
